title: Item
data:
{{version031}}

In the dungeon there are many different kinds of normal and magical '''items''' to be found and used. Some are good, others are bad. Some need to be [[Identification|identified]].

*[[File:Long sword1.png]] [[Weapon]]s

*[[File:Lightning rod.png]] [[Evocable items]]

*[[file:Spellbook.png]] [[Spell book]]s

==Item classification==
The colour of an item in inventory enhances the item's description as follows:

*{{LightGrey|Grey}}: is otherwise unnotable
*{{DarkGrey|Dark Grey}}: is useless or unusable/melded
*{{White|White}}: is a randart
*{{LightCyan|Light Cyan}}: is an unrand or evocable that's not dangerous
*{{Blue|Blue}}: is an unidentified magical item
*{{Green|Green}}: has an enchantment and/or ego or is a magical staff
*{{Red|Red}}: is cursed or harmful or discouraged by religion
*{{LightGreen|Bright Green}}: is uncursed and equipped
*{{LightRed|Bright Red}}: is cursed and equipped
*{{Yellow|Yellow}}: can help escape from or survive emergencies (teleport, healing, etc.)
*{{Cyan|Cyan}}: is rare and beneficial
*{{Magenta|Magenta}}: is dangerous to use but potentially useful
*{{LightMagenta|Light Magenta}}: is a Rune or the Orb of Zot

These colours can be changed with the [https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/master/crawl-ref/docs/options_guide.txt menu_colour] option.
